description: List material purchase order releases with filtering and pagination.

flags.description: Filter by purchase order ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.name: purchase-order

flags.description: Filter by trucker ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.name: trucker

flags.description: Filter by tender job schedule shift ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.name: tender-job-schedule-shift

flags.description: Filter by job schedule shift ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.name: job-schedule-shift

flags.description: Filter by broker ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.name: broker

flags.description: Filter by customer ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.name: customer

flags.description: Filter by customer ID for eligibility
flags.name: valid-for-customer

flags.description: Filter by material supplier ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.name: material-supplier

permissions: User must be authorized to access related purchase orders via the MaterialPurchaseOrderRelease policy (delegated to purchase orders), which allows access for admins or members of the purchase order broker, customer, or material supplier organizations.
validation_notes: Status filter must be one of editing, approved, redeemed, closed. is-assigned expects a boolean value (true/false). active and not-active require strict boolean values (true/false).
